item.title: 无论是否发生贸易战，全球投资者对中国的态度都会变得更加谨慎
item.description: 随着中国和美国就关税问题展开争论，世界上最大的两个经济体之间可能达成协议，也可能爆发贸易战，远离中国股市正成为外国投资者的默认选择。【原文：As China and the U.S. battle over tariffs, locked in a tussle that could result in a deal or a trade war between the world's two largest economies, staying away from China's stock market is becoming the default option for foreign investors.】

item.title: 在关税不确定的情况下，摩根士丹利下调美联储降息预期
item.description: 摩根士丹利与巴克莱（Barclays）和麦格理（Macquarie）一样，预测美国联邦储备委员会今年将单次降息 25 个基点，理由是唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策带来了不确定性。【原文：Morgan Stanley joined Barclays and Macquarie in forecasting a single 25 basis point interest rate cut by the U.S. Federal Reserve this year, citing uncertainty from President Donald Trump's tariff policy.】

item.title: 俄罗斯寻求终止外国企业对伏特加生产商俄罗斯标准公司的控股
item.description: 俄罗斯财政部周三表示，已将俄罗斯标准集团公司列入 "重要经济组织 "名单，并就其外国公司控股结构提起仲裁。【原文：Russia's finance ministry has added the Russian Standard Group companies to a list of "economically significant organisations" and launched an arbitration case over their foreign corporate holding structure, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，OpenAI 的 Altman 将在阿布扎比停留，参加 MGX 筹资谈判
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）计划本周访问阿拉伯联合酋长国，与阿布扎比投资集团 MGX 讨论融资事宜。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman plans to visit the United Arab Emirates this week to discuss raising funds with Abu Dhabi investment group MGX, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 独家：印度指控起亚在类似大众的争端中逃税 1.55 亿美元
item.description: 据一份文件和两位消息人士称，印度指控韩国起亚汽车公司通过对进口零部件进行错误分类而逃税 1.55 亿美元，但该汽车制造商否认有不当行为，这是一家外国汽车制造商与新德里就关税问题进行的最新斗争。【原文：India has accused South Korea's Kia of evading taxes of $155 million by misclassifying component imports but the carmaker has denied wrongdoing, the latest fight by a foreign automaker with New Delhi over tariffs, according to a document and two sources.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官称欧洲应与美国就液化天然气自由贸易进行谈判
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦尼（Patrick Pouyanne）周三表示，欧洲国家应通过谈判从美国获得液化天然气（LNG）自由贸易保障。【原文：TotalEnergies CEO Patrick Pouyanne said on Wednesday that European countries should negotiate to obtain a free trade guarantee on liquefied natural gas (LNG) from the United States.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：中国正酝酿调查苹果应用商店的收费标准和做法
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，中国反垄断监管机构正准备对苹果公司的政策和应用程序商店收费进行调查。【原文：China's antitrust regulator is preparing for a possible investigation into Apple's policies and app store fees, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 官员称，如果可再生能源发展缓慢，日本对液化天然气的需求可能会增加；加拿大将提供相关服务
item.description: 日本工业部的一位高级官员表示，在可再生能源推广速度低于预期的政府设想方案下，到2040年，日本对液化天然气（LNG）的需求可能会增长10%以上，达到约7400万吨。【原文：Japan's demand for liquefied natural gas (LNG) may grow by more than 10% to some 74 million metric tons by 2040 under a government scenario where the renewable energy rollout goes slower than expected, a senior industry ministry official said.】

item.title: Calastone称，投资者从股票中撤出现金，英国基金遭受重创
item.description: 基金网络 Calastone 周三表示，1 月份英国投资者从股票基金中净撤资 6.4 亿英镑（7.99 亿美元），结束了长期资金流入的势头，英国股票基金的月度净撤资额创下历史第六大纪录。【原文：British investors yanked a net 640 million pounds ($799 million) from equity funds in January, ending a long run of inflows, as UK-focused funds suffered their sixth-biggest monthly net withdrawals on record, funds network Calastone said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国外交部敦促中美在进口关税生效之际开展对话
item.description: 在美国对所有中国产品额外征收 10%关税之际，中国外交部周三呼吁中美两国进行对话和磋商。【原文：The Chinese foreign ministry called on Wednesday for dialogue and consultation between China and the United States as an additional 10% in U.S. tariffs on all Chinese products kicked in.】

item.title: 报告发现中国企业控制着印尼约 75% 的镍产能
item.description: 总部位于华盛顿的全球安全非营利组织 C4ADS 在一份报告中称，中国企业控制着印尼约 75% 的镍精炼产能，这引发了人们对供应链控制和环境风险的担忧。【原文：Chinese firms control about 75% of Indonesia's nickel refining capacity, raising concern over supply chain control and environmental risks, Washington-based global security nonprofit C4ADS has said in a report.】

item.title: 消息人士称，芬坎蒂耶里与挪威航运控股公司订购四艘邮轮，价值 90 亿欧元
item.description: 一位接近此事的消息人士周三表示，挪威航运控股公司（Norwegian Line Holdings）与意大利芬坎蒂耶里公司（Fincantieri）签订的四艘新游轮订单价值约90亿欧元（93.4亿美元）。【原文：An order by Norwegian Line Holdings with Italy's Fincantieri for four new cruise ships is worth around 9 billion euros ($9.34 billion), a source close to the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司因石油需求疲软导致第四季度利润下降
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周三公布的第四季度财报显示，该公司第四季度盈利下降 15%，结束了以低油价和燃料需求疲软为标志的一年。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies reported a 15% drop in fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday, closing out a year marked by low oil prices and weak fuel demand that were partially offset by higher electricity sales and liquefied natural gas trading.】

item.title: AMD 财报发布后股价跳水逾 8
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices 公司首席执行官预测数据中心销售额将下降（数据中心是该芯片制造商在人工智能领域收入的代表），该公司股价周三在欧洲下跌近 9%。【原文：Shares in Advanced Micro Devices dropped almost 9% in Europe on Wednesday after the company's chief executive forecast a decline in data centre sales - a proxy for the chipmaker's revenue from the artificial intelligence sector.】

item.title: 营收不及预期，Alphabet 法兰克福股价下跌 7
item.description: Alphabet 周三在法兰克福股价下跌 7.3%，一天前该公司公布的季度财报显示云计算收入增长放缓，未达分析师预期。【原文：Alphabet shares fell 7.3% in Frankfurt on Wednesday a day after the company reported quarterly earnings that showed cloud revenue growth slowed and missed analyst expectations.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司因石油需求疲软导致第四季度利润下降
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周三公布的第四季度财报显示，该公司第四季度盈利下降了15%，结束了以低油价和燃料需求疲软为标志的一年。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies reported a 15% drop in fourth quarter earnings on Wednesday, closing out a year marked by low oil prices and weak fuel demand which were partially offset by higher electricity sales and liquefied natural gas (LNG) trading.】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商和云服务提供商争相采用国产 DeepSeek
item.description: 中国企业，从芯片制造商到云服务提供商，都争先恐后地支持 DeepSeek 的人工智能模型，这让分析师们欢呼这是行业的 "分水岭时刻"。【原文：Chinese companies, from chip makers to cloud service providers, are rushing to support DeepSeek's artificial intelligence models, spurring analysts to hail a "watershed moment" for the industry.】

item.title: 诺和诺德第四季度利润超预期，预计 2025 年增长放缓
item.description: 伟哥生产商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）周三预测，2025年的销售增长速度将低于2024年，这可能会加深投资者对该公司在竞争激烈的肥胖症市场上被竞争对手礼来（Eli Lilly）甩开的担忧。【原文：Wegovy maker Novo Nordisk on Wednesday forecast slower sales growth for 2025 than 2024, a blow that is likely to deepen investor concerns that the company is losing its edge in the competitive obesity market to rival Eli Lilly .】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国已推迟或改变了 60 万吨小麦的进口方向
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的贸易消息人士称，中国已推迟进口多达 60 万公吨的小麦，主要是澳大利亚小麦，并将其中一些货物提供给其他买家，因为国内供应充足，减少了世界第一大谷物买家的需求。【原文：China has delayed imports of up to 600,000 metric tons of mostly Australian wheat and offered some of these cargoes to other buyers as ample domestic supplies reduce demand in the world's top buyer of the grain, two trade sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 世界黄金协会：2024 年黄金需求增长 1%，经济不确定性将继续支撑黄金需求
item.description: 世界黄金协会（WGC）周三表示，随着投资的增加，2024年全球黄金需求（包括场外交易）将增长1%，达到4974.5公吨的历史新高。【原文：Global gold demand including over-the-counter (OTC) trading rose by 1% to a record high of 4,974.5 metric tons in 2024 as investment increased, the World Gold Council (WGC) said on Wednesday, adding that central banks sped up buying in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 各国齐聚巴黎人工智能峰会，特朗普和 DeepSeek 成为焦点
item.description: 所有人的目光都聚焦在下周的法国首都，看看美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府能否与中国和其他近百个国家就人工智能的安全发展找到共同点。【原文：All eyes are on the French capital next week to see if U.S. President Donald Trump’s administration can find common ground with China and nearly 100 other nations on the safe development of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Equinor 第四季度利润超预期，上调 2030 年石油产量目标
item.description: Equinor 周三公布的 2024 年最后一个季度的利润略高于预期，同时上调了石油和天然气产量预期，并缩减了可再生能源产能扩张计划。【原文：Equinor on Wednesday posted slightly higher-than-expected profits for the final quarter of 2024, while raising its oil and gas output forecast and scaling back plans for renewable energy capacity expansion.】

item.title: 小米创始人为豪华版旗舰电动车设定 1 万辆销量目标
item.description: 小米公司创始人雷军周三在其红米账户上表示，小米旗舰电动车 SU7 Ultra 的豪华版将于 2 月底推出，今年的销售目标是 10,000 台。【原文：The luxury version of Xiaomi's flagship electric vehicle, the SU7 Ultra, will be launched at the end of February, with a sales target of 10,000 units for this year, founder Lei Jun said on his Red Note account on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本 SKY Perfect JSAT 将投资 2.3 亿美元建造观测卫星
item.description: 日本 SKY Perfect JSAT 公司周三表示，该公司将投资约 2.3 亿美元，利用美国 Planet Labs 公司的鹈鹕卫星建造一个低地轨道卫星星座。【原文：Japan's SKY Perfect JSAT will invest about $230 million to build a constellation of low-Earth orbit satellites using U.S. company Planet Labs' Pelican satellite, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲 市场对特朗普的加沙建议感到困惑
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 丰田将在中国设立全资电动汽车和电池部门
item.description: 全球销量第一的汽车制造商丰田汽车周三表示，将在上海成立一家全资公司，为雷克萨斯品牌开发和生产电动汽车和电池，并将于 2027 年开始生产。【原文：Toyota Motor will establish a wholly owned company in Shanghai to develop and produce electric vehicles and batteries for the Lexus brand, with production set to start in 2027, the world's top-selling automaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 丰田将全年利润展望上调 9%，达到近 310 亿美元
item.description: 丰田汽车公司周三将全年营业利润预期上调了 9%，这表明该公司有信心有能力抵御任何潜在的美国关税。【原文：Toyota Motor raised its full-year operating profit forecast by 9% on Wednesday, in a sign of confidence in its ability to ride out any potential U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，贝莱德计划在印度增聘 1200 名员工
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，贝莱德计划招聘近 1200 人，以扩大其在印度的两个支持中心。【原文：Blackrock plans to hire nearly 1,200 people to expand its two support hubs in India, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国钨生产商股价因中国政府最新出口限制措施而上涨
item.description: 在为期一周的农历新年假期结束后的首个交易日，市场对中国政府最新出台的重要矿产出口管制措施做出了反应，中国主要钨生产商的股票在周三反弹。【原文：Shares of major Chinese tungsten producers rallied on Wednesday as markets reacted to Beijing's latest critical mineral export controls on the first day of trading after the week-long Lunar New Year holiday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，花旗任命 Ashu Khullar 为全球资产管理公司联席主管
item.description: 根据路透社周三看到的一份内部备忘录，花旗集团已任命 Ashu Khullar 与 Anthony Diamandakis 合作，共同担任全球资产管理公司的联席主管。【原文：Citigroup has appointed Ashu Khullar to partner with Anthony Diamandakis to serve together as co-heads of global asset managers, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】
